mapper.select: SELECT a.res_code, a.repair_content, a.repair_date, a.repair_status, d.user_name , f.part_name , u.user_name FROM tbl_repair a JOIN tbl_res b ON a.res_code = b.res_code JOIN tbl_user u ON b.user_code = u.user_code JOIN tbl_repair_workers c ON a.res_code = c.res_code JOIN tbl_user d ON c.user_code = d.user_code JOIN tbl_repair_part e ON a.res_code = e.res_code JOIN tbl_part f ON e.part_code = f.part_code;
